articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'When Ishan gets his chance, we won't drop...': Rohit's big remark on Bharat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rohit Sharma spoke in detail about India's wicketkeeping conundrum in the longest format of the game following Bharat's inconsistent performances with the bat in the first three Tests against Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India faced a disappointing defeat in the third Test of the series against Australia last week, and will be aiming for a quick recovery in the final match of the series in Ahmedabad on Thursday.… [+2861 chars]
